short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you apply to jobs easier using AI!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ApplyGPT: AI-Powered Job Application Assistant (Beta)

Streamline your job application process with ApplyGPT, the intelligent Chrome extension that leverages the power of AI to automatically fill out job applications for you. (Required OpenAI api key)

Key Features:

Smart Form Filling: 
ApplyGPT uses advanced AI to identify and fill out relevant fields in job applications, saving you time and effort.

Personalized Applications: 
The extension uses your pre-filled information to tailor each application, ensuring consistency and accuracy across all your job submissions.

AI-Generated Cover Letters: 
Automatically generate customized cover letters based on the job description and your personal information.

Privacy-Focused: 
Your data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your personal information remains secure.

Customizable Inputs: 
Easily update your personal information, work experience, and education details through the settings page.

How It Works:

Fill in your details once in the extension settings.
Navigate to a job application page.
Activate ApplyGPT and watch as it intelligently fills out the application for you.
Review, make any necessary adjustments, and submit your application with confidence!

ApplyGPT is your personal job application assistant, helping you stand out in the competitive job market by allowing you to focus on what matters most - finding the right opportunity for your career.

Add ApplyGPT to your browser today!

Note: ApplyGPT requires an OpenAI API key to function. API usage may incur charges from OpenAI.
